title: Okta User Role Settings
description: (Okta Only) Used to configure user roles for new local accounts

OIDCAccessClientID.title: Access Client ID
OIDCAccessClientID.description: OIDC application to use for users that are allowed to create an account or log in to computers

OIDCAdminClientID.title: Admin Client ID
OIDCAdminClientID.description: OIDC application to use for users who are created as local administrators during account creation

OIDCSecondaryLoginClientID.title: Secondary Login Client ID
OIDCSecondaryLoginClientID.description: OIDC application to use for users that are allowed to create additional users on computers after the first account is created
